title: How to Prepare Cumin Tea

steps.headline: Take a vessel and add 1 teaspoon cumin seeds to it.
Heat it a little on low flame for about 5 seconds.
Pour 250 ml drinking water into it and let it boil.
After boiling, let it be covered and untouched for about 5 minutes.
Strain it into your teacup and enjoy it warm.
According to your taste you can add honey or a pinch of salt into it.

text: Take a vessel and add 1 teaspoon cumin seeds to it.  Heat it a little on low flame for about 5 seconds.  Pour 250 ml drinking water into it and let it boil.  After boiling, let it be covered and untouched for about 5 minutes.  Strain it into your teacup and enjoy it warm.  According to your taste you can add honey or a pinch of salt into it.  Finished.
